detaileddescription.para: Base script class for all motorized wheeled vehicles.

memberdef.argsstring: (TotalDamageResult damageResult, int damageType, EntityAI source, int component, string dmgZone, string ammo, vector modelPos, float speedCoef)
memberdef.name: EEHitBy

inbodydescription.para: actions runned when the engine on
leaking of coolant from radiator when damaged

memberdef.argsstring: (string zoneName, vector localPos, IEntity other, Contact data)
memberdef.name: OnContact

briefdescription.para: WARNING: Can be called very frequently in one frame, use with caution.
Responsible for damaging the car according to contact events from OnContact.
Responsible for damaging crew in a car crash.

detaileddescription.para: Gets called every sound simulation step. In this callback, user can modify behaviour of sound controllers The higher the return value is the more muted sound is.

inbodydescription.para: postpone the engine sound played from c++ on soundcontroller (via OnSound override)

detaileddescription.para: Gets called everytime when the specified vehicle's fluid changes its current value eg. when car is consuming fuel.
This callback is called on both server and client.
Gets called everytime the game wants to start the engine. This callback is called on server only.

simplesect.para: true if the engine can start, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Gets called everytime the engine starts.
Gets called everytime the engine stops.

detaileddescription.para:
DEPRECATED Gets called everytime the game wants to switch the lights.
true when lights can be switched, false otherwise.

briefdescription.para: Propper way to get if light is swiched on. Use instead of IsLightsOn().
Switches headlights on/off, including the illumination of the control panel and synchronizes this change to all clients.

memberdef.argsstring: (string soundset, EffectSound sound, out bool soundbool)
memberdef.name: PlaySoundEx

memberdef.argsstring: (string soundset, ref EffectSound sound, out bool soundbool)
memberdef.name: PlaySound
